value.name: Sarah Jessica Parker calls this volumizing spray 'a must' for giving hair 'more body' — and it's down to $20
value.description: To use, all you do is lift up small sections of dry hair and give a little spritz underneath, aiming at the roots. You can use your fingers to style it as you like once that's done — easy breezy. While a little goes a long way, its lightweight formulation means you won't feel greasy, even if you apply a little too much.
